description: GTK4 Interface, easy to use. Abolutely love it! It's my #1 for audio file tag editor.

summary: Everything I need, not cluttered or trying to scan my whole library

description: Simple tag editor that has all you need to edit single file or folder with files. It obviously not a solution for huge media library as EasyTag.
The app has a good design, but crashes on numerous occasions, like when I try to apply cover art to multiple albums at once.
Very easy to use. Looks and feels great.
Does what it says, responsive developer

If I could use the existing tags to rename the files themselves, then it'd be perfect.

It's also a little difficult to navigate, as I can't select multiple with ctrl+click nor can I use ctrl+a to select all like I'm used to. Since the use case is tagging en masse it should be less confusing to do so.
Works great however had to give the application access to "All user files" via Flatseal otherwise it was not able to edit anything.
I am using this to tag an entire album, and it has been working very well. 10/10, best tag editing program. Looks very good, too.
summary: Does exactly what it says it does, very well

description: Works well, but it seems like I can't just remove an album cover instead of replacing it.

Ok when it works but I find it very easy to lock up when trying to add an image to files.
Can't be killed. Not by the Gnome dialog that pops up. Not by flatpak kill, not by trying to shut down the computer.
Thanks for the effort but I can do without the grief.
Thanks for creating and sharing this beautiful and powerful application.

I love this app. It's super simple to use, and looks nice.
My favorite extra feature in this program is the ability to rename files based on a pattern like "{tracknum}. {artist} - {title}".

I only wish for the ability to edit more tags from the file, instead of the basic few that the program shows you, such as hidden/other random tags. 
And the ability to see album art dimensions and batch resize album art in px would be really nice too.

Mp3Tag on Windows does both of these.
Cumple con su función sin complicación, bastante útil para mantener una colección de música organizada.
Sencillo, muy facil de usar y simple
Excelente app para editar metadatos de archivos de audio. Me funcionó perfecto. Interfaz sencilla y bonita, muy fácil de usar.

Antes no me gustaba porque no tenia muchas cosas como Kid3 o EasyTag pero con el tiempo le fueron mejorando y añadiendo lo necesario. Ahora es mas sencilla que estas y provee las opciones necesarias para tener orden un nuestras canciones (para los pocos que descargamos y no usamos Streaming)
